favourite.article: Praise the Lord! Yes Hallelujah! Join with saints from every nation every tribe and tongue. Amen.
God is good to those who really worship Him, and it our great opportunity to praise Him. Hallelujah!

I love this hymn. I grew up in Plymouth Brethren and I just love it because I'm a poet and writer, and it reminds me that nothing I can say can capture the worth and majesty of the Lord Jesus Christ. To Him be all the glory!!!
What a day it will be! when every one in every nation will praise the Lord! - Halleluja, Amen.
